website_summaries.verdict: Blendable formula that’s easy to apply and disappears into skin.
pros: Buildable, hydrating coverage that’s good for all skin types, even reducing the appearance of fine, dry lines
Can be used under foundation for more coverage
cons: Build-up in the pores was reported in those with oily skin

customer_reviews.title: Picture Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. My friends told me about it and I decided to try it. It's inexpensive on here compared to purchasing it in the store. Whenever I wear it my boyfriend compliments on how smooth my skin looks. It's not heavy being it's light coverage. I recently ordered medium to dark and it was too light, but I was able to exchange it for the dark shade and the shade blended with my reddish brown skin. Like to wear it whenever I'm going out and there will be pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So glad that I purchased The Smashbox BB Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I have rosacea yet, this product works. I use Cetaphil lotion underneath for that extra layer of moisture and after allowing this to be absorbed, I add the BB cream. Sometimes when I have a very bad red breakouts a little concealer is used on such spots before the BB cream - just to make sure that they are not visible. Yet, on a daily basis the cream will cover light redness without irritating my commonly sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: L. A.

customer_reviews.title: Love this BB Cream!
customer_reviews.text: I love this!! Got a travel size in my IPSY bag, and I HAD to get a full size!! I love the matte coverage..looks great on! Great SPF to protect the skin in all types of weather! Great for all skin types!! I have normal to dry skin, and leaves a lovely matte finish with out drying out your skin!! Its never too late to take care of your skin, and this is a great product to use for any age group!!
customer_reviews.author: TaraTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: If you hate foundation...
customer_reviews.text: I never wear foundation because I've never found one that both feels good and looks good on my combination skin. I either get too much coverage or not enough. I either look too dry and caky or too shiny. When I tried this BB cream, I was thrilled. It's not as much coverage as a foundation (though I do dilute it a bit with regular moisturizer when I apply it), but it goes on smoothly, brightens me up and evens out my skin tone. I've been using this for a little over a year now (I just started my third tube of it—a little goes a long way) and I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome as a primer, love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great primer. I use it after applying moisturizer or sunscreen or serum. Then I apply my mineral makeup (glominerals brand). I LOVE that it is spf 35!!!! but it is the one product that doesn't bother my eyes (no I dont use it near my eyes but all sunscreen based products somehow seep into my very sensitive eyes its weird). It also gives a flawless base for your makeup. Rally enhances my everyday look. I end up having to use less concealers and makeup overall. I would use this by itself at the beach or running errands. I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.author: Princesmom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cream
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is so light in texture that I forget that it's on my face but at the same time offers good coverage. It blends very well into my skin and I only need to use a little of it. Just a little of this goes a long way so even if the bottle is small it's not going to run out quickly. Also, my skin is a very pale olive, meaning it's fair but with small gold tones to it. This color works very well to blend in despite that. Price is a bit high, as is the price for most good make up. I am glad I spent the money on it.
customer_reviews.author: fushigi85

customer_reviews.title: Not greasy at all.
customer_reviews.text: This product blended perfectly with my skin. It gave me nice coverage without feeling heavy. This will be my go to BB cream from now on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: With so many great recommendations, I decided to give this a try
customer_reviews.text: With so many great recommendations, I decided to give this a try. It is just okay. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Eardley

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Made my face oily and acne prone. The color is good. Formula... not so much
customer_reviews.author: DRK2022

customer_reviews.title: Not full coverage
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the coverage...Doesn't cover blemishes very well. I had to use foundation over it.
customer_reviews.author: Keneesha U.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! Not greasy
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I have fair skin so even in cloudy weather I have to wear sunscreen. It isn't oily or greasy even though it has SPF in it and it stays on all day. A little spendy, but worth it for the product. I would highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: It is NOT good for coverup but I use it to give my ...
customer_reviews.text: I have used this for years and I plan to keep using it for years to come. It is NOT good for coverup but I use it to give my skin a little glow and to keep it healthy. I Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to apply, nice results, little required for full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I didn't really wear / learn to wear makeup growing up and have been slowly figuring it out as I go. I find this very easy to apply with a flat foundation brush. I need to use very little - just a pea-sized amount - for full coverage. It feels light (I really don't feel or notice it at all throughout the day), lasts all day easily (even though I take hour long walks at lunch in sunny SoCal), and the sunscreen seems effective (again - long walks, sunny SoCal, and I'm quite pale), and does not look cake-y. I'm quite pleased and plan to continue using this for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: So light and covers great! I've always used Clinque... Even better makeup and after buying smashbox eyeshadow decided to give this a try... I really like it! It goes on smooth and natural (not cakey) while still covering and even skin. Plus... you get SPF35 built right in. Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: KZWofNC

customer_reviews.title: Ok But Heavy & No Under Eye Coverage
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this stuff, especially with the major price tag but all in all, it was ok. It felt pretty heavy and it really didn't conceal the darkness under my eyes like my usual cream does. It also didn't last nearly as long. I won't buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa W

customer_reviews.title: Got the product used
customer_reviews.text: I believe my product was used. I know this because the inner rim where the product exists should contain no product until it's used for the first time. Mine surely was. I am just too lazy to ship it back.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect weight and color for my fair, freckled skin (inherited from the Irish side of the family). Definitely worth getting the Smashbox Primer product to go under it.
customer_reviews.author: Margrethe Hackett

customer_reviews.title: Makes your face super oily
customer_reviews.text: i didn't get through even half this bottle before giving it away, makes my fave super oily and doesn't stay. By noon it's drooling down my face... Going back to my Tarte BB cream for sure
customer_reviews.author: Linda Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery time
customer_reviews.text: Used this product before true to color for red undertones. Great delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: Jimi

customer_reviews.title: Pretty much as described
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like Smashbox products and their BB cream is no exception. It goes on evenly and smoothly and tames any pores or fine lines you might have while also providing serious SPF 35 protection. Zero fragrance. High price is offset by the fact that you don't need to use much, so it lasts a long time. As others say, the "Fair" shade is very pale and more on the cool (bluish) side than warm (pink). It's also very light coverage...if you want more, you'll probably prefer a different product. For me it looks good, but everyone is different.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Executive

customer_reviews.title: Amazing coverage
customer_reviews.text: I just love this BB cream. You get wonderful coverage even with just one layer. Can be used with or without a pressed powder. Just love it.
customer_reviews.author: june loves shoes75

customer_reviews.title: excellent product
customer_reviews.text: works as described. Very light, almost too light for my fair skin. But I like it. It doesn't get oily and holds up well on sweaty days.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Loving

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product from Amazon on several occasions and could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for people with DRY skin!
customer_reviews.text: Product provides the moisture I need for the winter while making my skin look flawless!
customer_reviews.author: Lele77

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a light foundation/moisturizer. Sits very well all day....even through activities.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful product this is. I have tried other BB creams but this is by far the best. Not having to put moisturizer and primer on is brilliant. And this gives just the right amount of coverage. I just have to use a little powder and I'm all done for the foundation routine. FIVE STARS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand. Hate the color, which is my fault. Ordered wrong one.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Coe

customer_reviews.title: Looks really good on me
customer_reviews.text: Wear it to work daily. Looks really good on me.
customer_reviews.author: Oladipo Orimogunje

customer_reviews.title: Rad
customer_reviews.text: Same as buying it at sephora, came with box. Best foundation on the market. Not greasy or caulky. I love smash box.
customer_reviews.author: darian ralstin

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: This matches my skin perfectly!!!!!! Very sheer coverage. However the dark s not dark enough. I'm a medium brown complexion and the product should have more shades for African American women
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Mcfarlane

customer_reviews.title: not soo good and pricey!!!
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this based on many great reviews. it felt like i put white powder on my face. the dark isnt too dark. I just wasted my money. I will be trying iman bb cream ,hopefully that works for me.
customer_reviews.author: lily

customer_reviews.title: Smashbox Camera Ready BB Cream Is The Way To Go!!!
customer_reviews.text: This foundation is amazing! The "dark" color (Although I feel like the company should have come up with more clever names than light, medium, and dark:p) blends in like magic on most African American skin types. My type is more of a medium tone when it comes to the scale of African American skin tones, but I had my mom try it out who has a bit of a lighter complexion, and she said it still matched excellently with proper blending techniques. You can also go as light or "cakey" as you want!! I also love that a little bit goes a very long way on the face. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tina Tina

customer_reviews.title: Flawless and natural finish
customer_reviews.text: Love love this BB cream. It is my favorite. I tried others and unfortunately I don't get the same result. I combined it with my foundation and it give ne the flawless finish. I have bought it nany times already and will continue to do so. I hope they never discontinue it.
customer_reviews.author: Yarix

customer_reviews.title: "Found" all the dry skin on my face.
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this is a decent product, but, for me, there were some real problems. First, the color was too light. That's always a danger when buying something new without being able to sample it. Second and worse, it showed all the early-winter dry skin patches on my face that my moisturizer had hidden. Like regular foundation does, it "found" all the dry skin patches and highlighted them. OK, that showed me that I need to exfoliate, but I was actually TRYING to just put on makeup for the day! So, I had to stop and remove the dry skin, causing reddened areas from the process. What a nuisance!
customer_reviews.author: J. GrayTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I use this product for daily wear. A few years ago I was looking for something lighter to wear on my face because heavy foundation tends to melt in the warmer months. I did my research and found out that this cream might work for me. I tried it and have been using it ever since. I have acne probe skin so it’s important for me to have coverage without my skin suffocating under a layer of makeup. I put this on top of my concealer and it blends seamlessly. I get compliments regularly about my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Great coverage
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product for years. It goes on seamlessly and doesn’t just highlight each individual flake of skin. Quickly evens out my skin tone. Considering how fast I can apply it, it’s a definite step up from any type of concealer or powder.
customer_reviews.author: Arianna Guzman

customer_reviews.title: DON'T GET IT; LOOK TO SWITCH
customer_reviews.text: Smashbox discontinued their wonderful tinted sheer moisturizer so this was the next best option. It's far more expensive and has an spf of 35 -- which makes me feel like I'm applying waxy sunscreen every day instead of a nice tinted moisturizer. I immediately did research (using the EWG Skin Deep site) and found a nice all natural self-tanner lotion with low toxicity (True Natural Self Tanner) and today is my first time trying it. I hope it works so I can ditch the BB cream altogether.
customer_reviews.author: AJH

customer_reviews.title: Won't be without it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the even coverage I get with this product and it lasts all day, not a lot of time touching up. I use it with Smashbox Radiance Primer and get a great look for my mature skin.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I love Smashbox cosmetics and this is the best BB cream I have tried out of several drugstore brands and a couple of more expensive brands. I like to use it because it provides light coverage and includes sunscreen. It hasn't caused me to break out at all and it is relatively sweatproof. Depending on how much I sweat throughout the day, I have had times I have needed to reapply it, but if I put on some light powder over it that isn't really much of an issue.
customer_reviews.author: JennnTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: This is currently my favorite foundation - - it matches my light skin tone ...
customer_reviews.text: This is currently my favorite foundation - - it matches my light skin tone without looking too white or giving an un-natural tone to my skin. It helps hide discolorations and even out my skin without looking like I am wearing a ton of make-up. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie Cox

customer_reviews.title: Love it and use it everyday: coming for someone who has never used any foundation ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this! I've not used foundation or any kind of makeup in a long time. These were recommended to me at a Sephona store. This doesnt make my skin clogged like foundation, and looks very natural. I'd like a little more of yellow and a little less of red as a base tone. Not all dark skinned women have the same reddish undertones! Barring that, I think this is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: SM0610

customer_reviews.title: Great for young skin
customer_reviews.text: This stuff probably would be awesome for someone with no lines or wrinkles but it caked in my fine lines no matter how I patted and blotted and blended to the point I washed it all off and redid my makeup for my wedding so the pictures didn't show the terrible coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Tammi

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: I love this BB cream. It is a good staple to have in your bag. And, excellent for if you don't wear make-up but sometimes want an extra push to smooth your face out.
customer_reviews.author: ad2265

customer_reviews.title: Great with the mask
customer_reviews.text: I like wearing this makeup, its light and natural. It's great with wearing the required mask.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Casey

customer_reviews.title: I was looking for a BB cream closer to my complexion and this one had good reviews so I thought I would try it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a guy, and have been using the Lab Series BB Cream ever since it came out, but it's only available in a single shade. I was looking for a BB cream closer to my complexion and this one had good reviews so I thought I would try it. I tried applying this after moisturizing, but it just didn't spread as nicely as the Lab Series, it clumped up on every pore, stubble and skin imperfection. Looks like it's designed for woman with perfect skin.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! Does so many things for my acne prone skin- it moisturizes, provides spf, covers my problem areas and more. My skin breaks out if I don’t wear this! In love. Will keep buying
customer_reviews.author: S. Wells

customer_reviews.title: I've only used it once and it's already my favorite product! I use this by itself without any ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once and it's already my favorite product! I use this by itself without any other makeup and it covers my redness and pimples/blemishes. It's not too thick/creamy that I have to really rub it in and make sure it's been spread evenly, but it's also not too liquid-y that I have to apply a lot. I love that it has SPF in it!
customer_reviews.author: Bloom W.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised, (Thumbs up for the seller, timely delivery).Love this product
customer_reviews.author: SHER

customer_reviews.title: Made acne worst
customer_reviews.text: Made acne worst cant use any US makeup but UK becca the best
customer_reviews.author: Miss Dee

customer_reviews.title: They recommended this one
customer_reviews.text: I went to Sephora to find a BB cream that would work well. They recommended this one; I tried a sample of it and loved it. Amazon has the better price though!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna S.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Unsealed and a bit too light to be marketed towards darker complexions
customer_reviews.text: One star for arriving unsealed more than anything. Secondly the product was pretty light to be labled medium to dark.
customer_reviews.author: YKiki

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is the best. Nice creamy texture
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is the best. Nice creamy texture, perfect amount of color/moisturizer without feeling too thick. Love the SPF as well... great for fair skin. Sometimes I combine it with a little lotion when I use it to make it last longer.
customer_reviews.author: ElTee

customer_reviews.title: Best BB cream ever
customer_reviews.text: Better than foundation and makes my skin super soft. I'm also prone to horrible breakouts and they completely stopped when I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: Homeschoolers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best BB cream ever, I have been using this product for years
customer_reviews.author: Isla

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting a better product from smashbox
customer_reviews.text: Didn't seem to blend in well. It's the right color, but when applying it I couldn't get it to spread out evenly across my face. Was expecting a better product from smashbox.
customer_reviews.author: Ranndella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product.. Goes on smooth. Better then the Mac I bought. No red undertones. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Boimah

customer_reviews.title: goood
customer_reviews.text: A little too liquid like for my tastes other then that its perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Racheal

customer_reviews.title: Light and perfect for pale sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: Light and perfect for pale sensitive skin. I have dry skin and this along with the primer has really helped my skin calm down and become more moisturized.
customer_reviews.author: Windee McKinley

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing just the right amount of coverage
customer_reviews.text: I use this instead of foundation. It's amazing just the right amount of coverage
customer_reviews.author: TIARA

customer_reviews.title: Great makeup and I've tried them all
customer_reviews.text: It's just what they say - lighter weight makeup actually makes you look younger. Great makeup and I've tried them all!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Smashbox. Purchased the first time at Sephora. This BB cream blends perfectly with my skin tone.
customer_reviews.author: trinitee0971

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit light to be considered a dark shade. I didn't care for it. I have used department store bb creams that were better
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.text: I switched from my Estee Lauder BB cream based on reviews for this one. Although it feels very lightweight, it has nice coverage. The SPF is a MUST have, so that's a plus. I really love this BB cream and highly recommend it. Although I said you only have to apply once, I do workouts with it on, and I'm frequently patting down my face, so if you were going out later on in the evening, you might need to reapply a small amount.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa K. Pena

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!
customer_reviews.text: It's not thick, cakey, or runny, it evens out my complexion nicely. It doesn't even feel like I have make up on!
customer_reviews.author: Jessyca

customer_reviews.title: Best BB Cream Foundation
customer_reviews.text: Great Foundation very light weight and Duey. Not too dry not too Oily. Perfect for summer Holidays. Would highly recommend for a light coverage foundation.
customer_reviews.author: Rosaline

customer_reviews.title: Very Dark
customer_reviews.text: Love this cream but his shade is really dark. It is not for the slightly tanned or even bi-racial (like me) complexion. This is for dark skin. Very few companies make shades this dark - highly recomend but I had to order in a lighter shade.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

product_meta.title: Smashbox SPF 35 Camera Ready BB Cream Broad Spectrum, Dark, 1 Fluid Ounce
product_meta.description: Color:DarkSmashbox Camera Ready BB Cream Broad Spectrum SPF 35. Primes: Wear alone, or under your favorite foundation to create a smooth canvas. Perfects: Tinted formula in 8 shades evens out skin for a flawless finish. Hydrates: Improves skin moisture in 4 weeks, guaranteed. Protects: SPF 35 guards against UVA/UVB rays. Controls oil: Minimizes shine with no chalky finish. Formulated without parabens, sodium lauryl sulfate, phthalates, oil, fragrance and talc.
feature_bullets: Wear alone, or under your favorite foundation to create a smooth canvas.
Tinted formula in 8 shades evens out skin for a flawless finish.
Improves skin moisture in 4 weeks. Guaranteed.
